short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the test score on passmedicine.com and allows it to be toggled via a button on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Passmed Results Hider: Stay Focused on Your Revision

Passmed Results Hider is a simple, yet powerful Chrome plugin designed specifically for medical students using passmed.com. This tool gives you the ability to toggle the visibility of the "current question score" and "overall session percentage" tabs. With just one click, you can hide or unhide these distractions and focus entirely on the question in front of you.

Install Passmed Results Hider today and turn your focus back to what matters mostâ€”your learning and preparation for exams!
